cr.title: National Energy Security Intelligence Act of 2008
cr.excerpt: Thank you, Mr. Ruppersberger. Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 6545, the National Energy Security Intelligence Act of 2008. This bill will task the Director of National Intelligence to provide to Congress accurate and timely information on the effect of the current energy crisis on national security.
